name: NEW YORK STATE BAR ASSOCIATION
description: NYSBA is the largest voluntary state bar organization in the nation.
sampleDescriptions: Outreach and monitoring related to: the U.S. judicial system; funding for the U.S. judicial system; funding for hurricane and earthquake recovery efforts in Puerto Rico; immigration; tort reform.
